test_cases.description: Tests if the Serializers class is a utility class.

name: BoundedPriorityQueueTest
description: Unit tests for the BoundedPriorityQueue class, focusing on its behavior with different input scenarios and edge cases.

test_cases.name: emptyQueueAsListIsEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests that an empty BoundedPriorityQueue returns an empty list.

test_cases.name: singleItemReturnsSingleItem
test_cases.description: Tests that a BoundedPriorityQueue with a single item returns a list containing that single item.

test_cases.name: twoItemsReturnsSingleItemWhenMaxIsOne
test_cases.description: Tests that a BoundedPriorityQueue with two items and a max size of one returns a list containing the smallest item.

test_cases.name: twoItemsReturnsSingleItemWhenMaxIsOneInputOrderFlipped
test_cases.description: Tests that a BoundedPriorityQueue with two items and a max size of one returns a list containing the smallest item, even when input order is flipped.

test_cases.name: threeItemsReturnsTwoItemsWhenMaxIsOneInputOrderFlipped
test_cases.description: Tests that a BoundedPriorityQueue with three items and a max size of two returns a list containing the two smallest items, even when input order is flipped.

test_cases.name: threeItemsReturnsTwoItemsWhenMaxIsOneInputOrderIncreasing
test_cases.description: Tests that a BoundedPriorityQueue with three items and a max size of two returns a list containing the two smallest items, even when input order is increasing.

test_cases.name: threeItemsReturnsTwoItemsWhenMaxIsOneInputOrderMixed
test_cases.description: Tests that a BoundedPriorityQueue with three items and a max size of two returns a list containing the two smallest items, even when input order is mixed.

test_cases.name: threeItemsReturnsTwoItemsWhenMaxIsOneInputOrderMixed2
test_cases.description: Tests that a BoundedPriorityQueue with three items and a max size of two returns a list containing the two smallest items, even when input order is mixed.

test_cases.name: threeItemsReturnsThreeItemsWhenMaxIsOneInputOrderFlipped
test_cases.description: Tests that a BoundedPriorityQueue with three items and a max size of ten returns a list containing all three items, even when input order is flipped.

test_cases.name: threeItemsReturnsThreeItemsWhenMaxIsOneInputOrderIncreasing
test_cases.description: Tests that a BoundedPriorityQueue with three items and a max size of ten returns a list containing all three items, even when input order is increasing.

test_cases.name: threeItemsReturnsThreeItemsWhenMaxIsOneInputOrderMixed
test_cases.description: Tests that a BoundedPriorityQueue with three items and a max size of ten returns a list containing all three items, even when input order is mixed.

test_cases.name: threeItemsReturnsThreeItemsWhenMaxIsOneInputOrderMixed2
test_cases.description: Tests that a BoundedPriorityQueue with three items and a max size of ten returns a list containing all three items, even when input order is mixed.

test_cases.name: testInstantiateWithNegativeSizeThrowsIAE
test_cases.description: Tests that instantiating a BoundedPriorityQueue with a negative size throws an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testInstantiateWithZeroSizeThrowsIAE
test_cases.description: Tests that instantiating a BoundedPriorityQueue with a size of zero throws an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testAddNullThrowsNPE
test_cases.description: Tests that adding a null item to a BoundedPriorityQueue throws a NullPointerException.

name: LineTest
description: Unit tests for the Line class, focusing on intersection and distance calculations with other geometric shapes.

test_cases.name: testDoesIntersectOtherLine
test_cases.description: Tests if two lines intersect.

test_cases.name: testDoesNotIntersectLine
test_cases.description: Tests if two lines do not intersect.

test_cases.name: testDoesIntersectRectangle
test_cases.description: Tests if a line intersects a rectangle.

test_cases.name: testDoesNotIntersectRectangle
test_cases.description: Tests if a line does not intersect a rectangle.

test_cases.name: testLineIntersectsCircle
test_cases.description: Tests if a line intersects a circle.

test_cases.name: testLineDoesNotIntersectCircle
test_cases.description: Tests if a line does not intersect a circle.

test_cases.name: testLineDoesNotIntersectCircleEast
test_cases.description: Tests if a line does not intersect a circle to the east.

test_cases.name: testLineDoesIntersectCircleEast
test_cases.description: Tests if a line intersects a circle to the east.

test_cases.name: testLineDoesNotIntersectCircleWest
test_cases.description: Tests if a line does not intersect a circle to the west.

test_cases.name: testLineDoesIntersectCircleWest
test_cases.description: Tests if a line intersects a circle to the west.

test_cases.name: testLineDoesNotIntersectCircleNorth
test_cases.description: Tests if a line does not intersect a circle to the north.

test_cases.name: testLineDoesNotIntersectCircleSouth
test_cases.description: Tests if a line does not intersect a circle to the south.

test_cases.name: testLineDoesIntersectCircleSouth
test_cases.description: Tests if a line intersects a circle to the south.

test_cases.name: testLineMbr
test_cases.description: Tests the minimum bounding rectangle (MBR) of a line.

test_cases.name: testLineSameXWithinCircle
test_cases.description: Tests if a line with the same X coordinates intersects a circle.

test_cases.name: testLineIsPointWithinCircle
test_cases.description: Tests if a line represented as a point intersects a circle.

test_cases.name: testLineIsPointOutsideCircle
test_cases.description: Tests if a line represented as a point does not intersect a circle.

test_cases.name: testLineDistanceToRectangle
test_cases.description: Tests the distance from a line to a rectangle.

test_cases.name: testLineDistanceToRectangleIsZeroWhenOneEndIsInside
test_cases.description: Tests if the distance from a line to a rectangle is zero when one end of the line is inside the rectangle.

test_cases.name: testLineDistanceToRectangleIsZeroWhenOtherEndIsInside
test_cases.description: Tests if the distance from a line to a rectangle is zero when the other end of the line is inside the rectangle.

test_cases.name: testLineDistanceToRectangleIsZeroWhenContainsWestEdge
test_cases.description: Tests if the distance from a line to a rectangle is zero when the line contains the west edge of the rectangle.

test_cases.name: testLineDistanceToRectangleIsZeroWhenContainsNorthEdge
test_cases.description: Tests if the distance from a line to a rectangle is zero when the line contains the north edge of the rectangle.

test_cases.name: testLineDistanceToRectangleIsZeroWhenContainsSouthEdge
test_cases.description: Tests if the distance from a line to a rectangle is zero when the line contains the south edge of the rectangle.

test_cases.name: testLineDistanceToRectangleIsZeroWhenContainsEastEdge
test_cases.description: Tests if the distance from a line to a rectangle is zero when the line contains the east edge of the rectangle.

test_cases.name: testLineDoesNotIntersectsPoint
test_cases.description: Tests if a line does not intersect a point.

test_cases.name: testLineDoesIntersectPoint
test_cases.description: Tests if a line intersects a point.

test_cases.name: testLineDoubleIntersectsWithHorizontalLine
test_cases.description: Tests if a line intersects a horizontal line using Line2D.Double.

test_cases.name: testLineFloatIntersectsWithHorizontalLine
test_cases.description: Tests if a line intersects a horizontal line using Line2D.Float.

name: Line2D_ptSegDistTest
description: Unit tests for the ptSegDist method of the Line2D class.

test_cases.name: testPtSegDist
test_cases.description: Tests the ptSegDist method of the Line2D class to calculate the distance from a point to a line segment.

name: ImmutableStack_emptyTest
description: Unit test for checking if an empty ImmutableStack is indeed empty.

test_cases.name: testEmptyStackIsEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests if an empty ImmutableStack is correctly identified as empty.

name: NodePosition_toStringTest
description: Unit test for the toString method of NodePosition class.

test_cases.name: testToString
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of the NodePosition class, ensuring it returns the expected string representation.

name: Util_addTest
description: Unit test for the add method in the Util class.

test_cases.name: testAdd
test_cases.description: Tests the add functionality of the Util class by adding an element to a list and verifying the result.

name: ImmutableStack_popTest
description: Unit tests for the pop functionality of the ImmutableStack class.

test_cases.name: testPopOnNonEmptyStack
test_cases.description: Tests the pop functionality on a non-empty stack, ensuring the correct element is removed and the new top element is correctly identified.

test_cases.name: testPopOnEmptyStack
test_cases.description: Tests the pop functionality on an empty stack, expecting a RuntimeException to be thrown.

name: ImmutableStack_peekTest
description: Unit tests for the peek method of the ImmutableStack class.

test_cases.name: testPeekOnNonEmptyStack
test_cases.description: Tests the peek functionality of the ImmutableStack when the stack is non-empty.

test_cases.name: testPeekOnEmptyStack
test_cases.description: Tests the peek functionality of the ImmutableStack when the stack is empty, expecting a RuntimeException.

name: Line2D_ptSegDistSqTest
description: Unit tests for the ptSegDistSq method in the Line2D class.

test_cases.name: testPtSegDistSq_PointOnSideOfX1Y1
test_cases.description: Tests the ptSegDistSq method with a point on the side of (x1, y1).

test_cases.name: testPtSegDistSq_PointOnSideOfX2Y2
test_cases.description: Tests the ptSegDistSq method with a point on the side of (x2, y2).

test_cases.name: testPtSegDistSq_PointBetweenX1Y1AndX2Y2
test_cases.description: Tests the ptSegDistSq method with a point between (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).

name: ImmutableStack_iteratorTest
description: Unit tests for the iterator functionality of the ImmutableStack class.

test_cases.name: testIteratorWithNonEmptyStack
test_cases.description: Tests the iterator functionality with a non-empty stack.

test_cases.name: testIteratorWithEmptyStack
test_cases.description: Tests the iterator functionality with an empty stack.

name: ObjectsHelper_asClassTest
description: Unit tests for the ObjectsHelper.asClass method and private constructor coverage.

test_cases.name: testAsClassWithNullObject
test_cases.description: Tests the asClass method with a null object, expecting the result to be an empty Optional.

test_cases.name: testAsClassWithIncorrectClass
test_cases.description: Tests the asClass method with an object of incorrect class, expecting the result to be an empty Optional.

test_cases.name: testAsClassWithCorrectClass
test_cases.description: Tests the asClass method with an object of correct class, expecting the result to be a present Optional containing the object.

test_cases.name: coverPrivateConstructor
test_cases.description: Tests the instantiation of ObjectsHelper for test coverage purposes only.

name: Util_mbrTest
description: Unit tests for the Util.mbr method which calculates the minimum bounding rectangle (MBR) for a collection of geometries.

test_cases.name: testMbrWithSingleItem
test_cases.description: Tests the calculation of MBR with a single item in the collection.

test_cases.name: testMbrWithEmptyCollection
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of the MBR calculation with an empty collection, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testMbrWithDoublePrecision
test_cases.description: Tests the calculation of MBR with items having different precision levels.

name: Line2D_linesIntersectTest
description: Unit tests for the Line2D.linesIntersect method, which checks if two lines intersect.

test_cases.name: testLinesIntersect_IntersectingLines
test_cases.description: Tests if two intersecting lines are correctly identified as intersecting.

test_cases.name: testLinesIntersect_NonIntersectingLines
test_cases.description: Tests if two non-intersecting lines are correctly identified as non-intersecting.

test_cases.name: testLinesIntersect_CollinearNonIntersectingLines
test_cases.description: Tests if two collinear but non-intersecting lines are correctly identified as non-intersecting.

test_cases.name: testLinesIntersect_TouchingAtEndpoint
test_cases.description: Tests if two lines touching at an endpoint are correctly identified as intersecting.

name: RTree_searchTest
description: Unit tests for the search functionality of the RTree class with different intersection scenarios.

test_cases.name: testSearchWithIntersects
test_cases.description: Tests the search functionality of the RTree with a mock intersection function that always returns true.

test_cases.name: testSearchWithNonIntersectingGeometry
test_cases.description: Tests the search functionality of the RTree with a mock intersection function that always returns false.

name: BoundedPriorityQueue_asOrderedListTest
description: Unit tests for the asOrderedList method of BoundedPriorityQueue.

test_cases.name: testAsOrderedListWithEmptyQueue
test_cases.description: Tests the asOrderedList method when the queue is empty.

test_cases.name: testAsOrderedListWithSingleElement
test_cases.description: Tests the asOrderedList method when the queue contains a single element.

test_cases.name: testAsOrderedListWithMultipleElements
test_cases.description: Tests the asOrderedList method when the queue contains multiple elements.

name: Util_removeTest
description: Unit tests for the Util.remove method which removes specified elements from a list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveElementsFromList
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of specific elements from a list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAllElementsFromList
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of all elements from a list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveNoElementsFromList
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of no elements from a list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveNonExistentElementsFromList
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of non-existent elements from a list.

name: RTree_nearestTest
description: Unit tests for the nearest functionality of the RTree class.

test_cases.name: testNearestWithinDistance
test_cases.description: Tests the nearest functionality of the RTree within a specified distance.

test_cases.name: testNearestWithNoMatches
test_cases.description: Tests the nearest functionality of the RTree when no matches are found within the specified distance.

test_cases.name: testNearestWithMaxCount
test_cases.description: Tests the nearest functionality of the RTree with a specified maximum count of results.
